problem:
Given the system of equations:

\begin{align*}
4a + 3b + 2c &= 23, \\
3a - b + 5c &= 10, \\
2a + 2b - c &= 5
\end{align*}

What is the value of $a + b + c$?
solution: Solving the system, we can get that $a = \frac{-52}{19}, b = \frac{149}{19}, c = \frac{99}{19}$. Then we get $a + b + c = \frac{149 + 99 - 52}{19} = \boxed{\frac{196}{19}}$
